actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer to questions submitted in connection with a census or survey conducted under title 13, United Stated Code, shall not be applicable to any census taken under section 142 of such title.

summary.text: Removes the criminal penalties presently applicable to those individuals who refuse or neglect to answer agricultural, irrigation, or drainage census questions.

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer to questions submitted in connection with a census or survey conducted under title 13, United Stated Code, shall not be applicable to any census taken under section 142 of such title.
